author: jujubowl
content: Hi everyone, I am joining here because I wish that I could dive much deeper into this area. Currently,  I am reading through the available material on the apprenticeship program git page. <:foundation:898330948750426172>

author: jujubowl
content: My background: I had been doing modern & contemporary art for years until I got fascinated by Ethereum and the decentralized world<:crazycry:932693133546889216>  .  And then I decided to go much deeper and now I am doing my master's degree in CS  while learning about Ethereum.
